name: Jungle Journey
description:
Let me guide you through the rainforest of South America! Here you can see different and interesting plants and animals, all handdrawn by me! Enjoy the atmosphere and just walk around a little. Maybe you also learn something about those animals...

---
Developed by Hannah Pollow
Find me on: https://twitter.com/Hanndragggon

Huge Programming Support by my racoon <3
